abstract: Comcast, the country’s largest cable company, says it has no interest in offering Netflix to its Xfinity subscribers in the form of either an on-demand service or a billing partnership
snippet: Comcast, the country’s largest cable company, says it has no interest in offering Netflix to its Xfinity subscribers in the form of either an on-demand service or a billing partnership
lead_paragraph: Netflix may have hit a snag as it negotiates with cable operators.

headline.main: Comcast Declines to Offer Netflix to Its Customers
